unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: LSAT Challenge
question_text: Two competing universities each believed that they better prepared their students for law school.  They hired an independent researcher to create a $95\%$ confidence interval for the difference between the mean LSAT scores of the two schools.  Thirty-five pre-law students from each school were randomly selected.  At School $1$ the mean LSAT score was $171$ with a standard deviation of $14$ .  At School $2$ the mean LSAT score was $168$ with a standard deviation of $11$ . Using Table B for your critical value, which is the correct $95\%$ confidence interval for the difference between the mean LSAT scores of the two schools?
